sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content:
Config.Machine returns information about the machine that the program is currently running on. The parameter machineCode determines what sort of information is passed back. machineCode has a number of possible values, all summarized by a set of predefined constants.

At the time of this writing, the following constants were defined:

cmProcessor   return an encoding of the processor number.
cmFPU   return 1 if there is an FPU installed, 0 if not.
cmOS   return the current version number of the operating system (e.g. 6.07 = 607).
sections.text_content:
Config.Machine returns information about the machine that the program is currently running on. The parameter machineCode determines what sort of information is passed back. machineCode has a number of possible values, all summarized by a set of predefined constants.
At the time of this writing, the following constants were defined:
cmProcessor return an encoding of the processor number.cmFPU return 1 if there is an FPU installed, 0 if not.cmOS return the current version number of the operating system (e.g. 6.07 = 607).
sections.mdown_content:
**Config.Machine** returns information about the machine that the program is currently running on. The parameter _machineCode_ determines what sort of information is passed back. _machineCode_ has a number of possible values, all summarized by a set of predefined constants.

At the time of this writing, the following constants were defined:


_cmProcessor_   return an encoding of the processor number.
_cmFPU_   return 1 if there is an FPU installed, 0 if not.
_cmOS_   return the current version number of the operating system (e.g. 6.07 = 607).

sections.title: Example
code:
if Config.Machine (cmFPU) = 1 then
            put "The machine has an FPU installed"
        else
            put "The machine does not have an FPU installed"
        end if
sections.raw_content: This program prints whether the machine has an FPU or not.
sections.text_content: This program prints whether the machine has an FPU or not.
sections.mdown_content: This program prints whether the machine has an FPU or not.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Config.Machine, not by calling Machine.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling Config.Machine, not by calling Machine.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling **Config.Machine**, not by calling **Machine**.
